languages.text: "Сказала любительница общаться с шепотами. Не уверена, кстати, что у тебя была эта милая привычка до похода на Эпитафию".
"Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."
languages.original_text: "Сказала любительница общаться с шепотами. Не уверена, кстати, что у тебя была эта милая привычка до похода на Эпитафию".

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who likes to shoot the breeze with the ghosts. I'm not quite sure that you had this habit before coming to Epitaph, too."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who likes to shoot the breeze with the ghosts. I'm not quite sure that you had this habit before coming to Epitaph, too."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who likes to shoot the breeze with the ghosts. I'm not quite sure that you had this habit before coming to Epitaph either"
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who likes to shoot the breeze with the ghosts. I'm not quite sure that you had this habit before coming to Epitaph either"
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: « Dit celle qui bavarde avec des voix dans sa tête... En fait, je me demande si vous aviez déjà cette habitude avant de venir sur Épitaphe... »
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: « C'est marrant d'entendre ça de la bouche de celle qui bavarde avec des fantômes. En fait, je me demande si vous aviez déjà cette habitude avant de venir sur Épitaphe... »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: «Y eso lo dice alguien que habla con los susurros de su mente. No sé si esa costumbre ya la tenía antes de venir a Epitafio».
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: «Lo dice {mf|el|la} que disfruta cosiendo a balazos a los fantasmas. Tampoco sé yo si tenía usted esa costumbre antes de venir a Epitafio».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: “一个喜欢和脑子里的声音聊天的人，居然说心灵锁很危险。我不知道你去荒垄碑碣之前有没有那个爱好。”
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: “一个喜欢和鬼魂闲聊的人，居然说心灵锁很危险。我不知道你去荒垄碑碣之前有没有那个爱好。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: 「亡霊と無駄話をするのが好きなヤツが言ったんだ。エピタフに来る前から、そういう習慣があったとは思えないけどね」
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: 「亡霊と無駄話をするのが好きなヤツが言ったんだ。エピタフに来る前から、そういう習慣があったとは思えないけどね」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Sagt die Frau mit flüsternden Stimmen im Kopf. Ich weiß nicht, ob Ihr diese Angewohnheit schon hattet, bevor Ihr nach Epitaph gekommen seid."
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt die Person, die gerne mit Geistern plaudert. Ich weiß auch nicht recht, ob Ihr diese Angewohnheit schon hattet, bevor Ihr nach Epitaph gekommen seid."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: "Sen beynindeki fısıltılarla konuşuyorsun be. Sinyazıt'a gelmeden önce de böyle miydin emin değilim."
languages.original_text: "Said the one who chats with the whispers in her head. You know, I'm not sure that you had that habit before coming to Epitaph."
